glass.generalGuidance: Glass is infinitely recyclable. Rinse containers and remove lids before recycling.
glass.recyclingProcess: Glass is crushed, melted, and reformed into new containers with less energy than virgin production.
glass.saSpecificGuidance: Use The Glass Recycling Company's bottle banks or retailer take-back schemes for refundable bottles.

regionalVariations.guidance: Cape Town offers kerbside glass collection in many suburbs.
Pikitup provides numerous public glass drop-off facilities.

localResources.title: The Glass Recycling Company
localResources.description: Nationwide database of glass drop-off points

metal.generalGuidance: Separate aluminium from steel when possible and ensure cans are empty and rinsed.
metal.recyclingProcess: Metals are sorted magnetically, baled, melted and rolled into new sheets.
metal.saSpecificGuidance: Collect-a-Can operates national buy-back centres for aluminium beverage cans.

regionalVariations.guidance: Scrap dealers buy most metal types at market rates.

diyTips: Use a magnet to sort steel vs aluminium
